item.description:
Boston SEO Networking Roundtable Panel

We invite local Boston seo, affiliate marketing and search engine marketing professionals in New England area to join us.

Robbins Library
700 Massachusetts Avenue
Arlington, MA 02476
ph 781-316-3200

@ Community Room That holds a 100 people

Take The elevator to the basement

Parking: Try on Mass Ave if not there is a lot across the street behind Bank of America & Not Your Average Joe's restaurant

Agenda:

6:30pm to 7pm: Open Networking

Business Card Buffet: drop you card on the networking buffet

7pm to 7:45: 2 Min Elevator Pitch:

* Tell us about you and your business or website interest
* Any networking goal your trying to achieve out of this meeting?
* Optional: Share a general marketing tip to the group


NEW FORMAT: SEO Roundtable Panel

7:45pm to 8:30pm:

Will have a few regular pro's speak up about there experiences and share tips to the group in a moderated panel discussion

Speakers Topics:

- Best search engine ranking tips
- Compare different SEO strategies to earning quality traffic.
- SEO case study site examples

- Intro on the Panel speakers

David Matson
Dave Matson is the proprietor of GetLawyerLeads.com, a boutique internet marketing firm for attorneys. We generate artisan criminal defense leads crafted from the finest old world ingredients, for only the most discriminating defense attorneys.
Shoplifters of the world, Unite! and fill out my contact forms.
http://www.getlawyerl...
http://www.highsteppi...

Peter T Davis
http://www.PeterTDavi...
http://www.zealot.com...

Jeff Selig
Prospectiv

We find, engage and acquire consumers interested in our advertiser’s brands and products and convert them to long-term profitable customers. Prospectiv provides industry-leading customer acquisition and email marketing solutions to leading consumer brands. Prospectiv generates more than 50 million pre-qualified leads per year on a pay-for-results basis for clients, including many Fortune 1000 companies.

BostonMediaDomain

BostonMediaDomain.com buys, sells, and develops businesses around Internet domain names. BostonMediaDomain.com, where the domain serves the medium!
http://www.prospectiv...
http://bostonmediadom...

Brian Hawkins – Moderator
http://www.Pingo.com...

- Possible panel questions

1. What's the best advice that you'd share to a beginner that is attending tonight?
2. Best advanced SEO tip to share with the group
3. What's worked for you to grow your sites traffic?
4. What CMS do you like to use to build a website?
5. Share some of your link building strategies?
6. Outsourcing SEO tasks……..
7. Discuss new trends: social media, video, podcasting..etc.


8:30 to 8:45pm Open Round Table Challenge Discussion:

Get Free SEO consulting from the SEO pro's that Attend!

Please be specific about your challenge in your website.


8:45pm The End

We look forward to seeing you all at this informal Boston search engine round table discussion!


The Cambridge SEO MeetUp

----------------------------------
Guest Speaker's Wanted:

We've been working hard to find industry experts and to develop a formal agenda to keep it interesting for all those that attend at this new big meeting room.

Food Event Sponsors:

SEO Pro's, will work for food! Contact us about sponsoring the event with goodies and drinks in exchange for publicity.

group.name: The Cambridge Search Engine Optimization Meetup Group

item.name: Boston SEO Networking Roundtable Panel
